metadata.title: CVE-2021-47329 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:scsi: megaraid_sas: Fix resource leak in case of probe failureThe driver doesn't clean up all the allocated resources properly whenscsi_add_host(), megasas_start_aen() function fails during the PCI deviceprobe.Clean up all those resources.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
